name: Yellow Shark Mill Company · Sales Route Assistant
description: Minimal config. Holds only AI prompt templates (per platform) and export schemas. Conversation flow stays in the system prompt.

platforms.name: Gemini
platforms.prompt_template:
Retrieve a list of Regional Chain Bakeries and Artisan/High-End Bakeries located in {{TargetLocation}}.

Include only bakeries that bake in-house and purchase flour by pallet or bulk.
Exclude supermarkets, cafés, and national chains.

For each bakery, provide:
- Company name
- Contact person or owner (if available)
- Address, city, state, postal code, and country
- Phone number
- Email (if available)
- Website (if available)

Data Integrity Rule:
- For proprietary fields (Owner/Contact Person and Email), leave blank if not publicly available.
- For public-facing fields (Address, Phone Number, Website), perform a reasonable targeted web search to locate and fill these fields; do not leave blank if easily verifiable.

Final, Critical Step (must be executed last):
Return the data ONLY as raw CSV text — no markdown tables, no summaries, no explanations — using these headers:
CompanyName, ContactName, Address, City, State, PostalCode, Country, Phone, Email, Website

platforms.name: Copilot
platforms.prompt_template:
Search for bakeries in {{TargetLocation}} that meet these criteria:

- Regional Chain (5–100 locations) or Artisan/High-End
- Bakes in-house
Exclude grocery stores, cafés, and nationwide franchises.

For each bakery, include:
- Company name
- Contact person or owner (if available)
- Address, city, state, postal code, and country
- Phone number
- Email (if available)
- Website (if available)

Data Quality Requirement:
If the phone number or primary address is missing, perform a targeted web search to complete those fields before finalizing the table.

Final, Critical Step (must be executed last):
Return the results ONLY as plain CSV text — no markdown formatting, no commentary — using these headers:
CompanyName, ContactName, Address, City, State, PostalCode, Country, Phone, Email, Website

platforms.name: Grok
platforms.prompt_template:
List all Regional Chain and Artisan/High-End Bakeries in {{TargetLocation}}.

Include for each:
- Company name
- Contact person or owner (if available)
- Address, city, state, postal code, and country
- Phone number
- Email (if available)
- Website (if available)

Data Completeness Rule:
If the phone number or primary address is missing, perform an additional targeted search to locate and fill those fields before finalizing the table.

Final, Critical Step (must be executed last):
Return the data ONLY as raw CSV text (NO markdown tables, NO explanations) using these headers:
CompanyName, ContactName, Address, City, State, PostalCode, Country, Phone, Email, Website

instructions: Go to https://www.geocod.io and select USPS ZIP+4 to get Latitude and Longitude for each address.
Once Latitude and Longitude are added by Geocodio, import the updated CSV into Gemini and prompt: Create a multi-stop route optimized for shortest travel distance.

meta.author: Internet Engineer
meta.notes: v3.2-min: Per-platform templates inside JSON; system prompt handles flow and rendering.
